news.title: 13 Ways Businesses Can Use SEO & Marketing to Combat Coronavirus Impact
news.description: Marketing projects you can tackle during this time include updating your GMB listings, reviewing content assets, and publicizing your use of video chat and remote work options.

news.title: Early Look: Google Ads Customer Value Reporting and Conversion Value Rules
news.description: Two new test features in Google Ads would allow users to sort their highest value customers by demographic, and customize conversion values to reflect their business objectives.

news.title: 5 Completely Sane Reasons Why You Shouldnâ€™t Stop SEO Efforts During COVID-19
news.description: Businesses that continue to invest in search marketing during the coronavirus outbreak can benefit from increased cash flow and measurable SEO initiatives, among other gains.

news.title: Keeping Your GMB Listing Accurate & Updated During COVID-19 Pandemic
news.description: Utilizing GMB features that allow you to update your hours, contact information, description, and more can help your clients continue to reach you during the coronavirus crisis.
